events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but would like to request a refund because it does not fit properly and I no longer want it.
The case has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's mention of wanting to return the jacket for money back.
An agent specializing in refund requests has been assigned to handle the customer's case promptly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket you ordered.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and still has the original tags attached?
Sure, the order number is 1234567890. The jacket is new, I haven’t worn it and all tags are still intact.
Thanks for the info. You are eligible for a full refund. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly.
Thank you, that sounds great. I appreciate the quick response and will send the jacket back as soon as I receive the label.
We have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have sent back the jacket and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund process.
Yes, I mailed the jacket yesterday and I look forward to receiving my refund shortly. Thanks again for the help!
Your refund has been processed successfully. Thank you for your patience, and we have closed your case now.
